component.text: This property will set the device to obtain an IP address automatically.

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands:
Enter the command to display the IP configuration on a Windows PC.

Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7601]
Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

command.deviceresponse:
Windows IP Configuration

Ethernet adapter Local Area Connection:

Connection-specific DNS Suffix . : cisco.com
Link-local IPv6 Address . . . . . : fe80::b0ef:ca42:af2c:c6c7%16
IPv4 Address. . . . . . . . . . . : 10.82.240.197
Subnet Mask . . . . . . . . . . . : 255.255.255.0
Default Gateway . . . . . . . . . : 10.82.240.198

command.instruction: You successfully displayed the IP configuration on a Windows PC.
